dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created for the study, comprising inter-subject shared responses, subject-specific responses/noise from the same brain region, and subject-specific responses/noise from different brain regions.
dcterms:title: Synthetic EEG Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. P. Broderick
A. J. Anderson
G. M. Di Liberto
M. J. Crosse
E. C. Lalor
dcterms:description: A naturalistic audio speech EEG dataset comprising 128-channel EEG signals collected from 19 subjects while they listened to a popular fictional audio story.
dcterms:title: Naturalistic Audio Speech EEG Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Chen
et al.
dcterms:description: A large finer-grained affective computing EEG dataset collected from 123 subjects while they watched emotional video clips.
dcterms:title: FACED Dataset
